name: Nomori
storyline:
When exploring a sacred forest near her grandparents house Kiko enters Nomori, an otherworldly place tied to the forest. She discovers that a real world logging operation is slowly destroying Nomori.
With the help of a spirit named Usa, Kiko helps the stranded spirits relocate to a new home.

Can you stop the destruction & save the spirits?
summary: Nomori is a mind-bending puzzle game where you need to control time and space to journey through a shattered spirit world. Take shortcuts through portals, rotate your perspective, and control the flow of time to move forward, whichever way that is.
